resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1998</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:Modals and Semi Modals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Strategies:Modals und halb Modals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Strategies:Modals et Semi-finale d'écoute Modals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Strategies:Modals e semi Modals escutando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Strategies:Modals e semi Modals ascoltanti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακουσμα Strategies:Modals και ημι Modals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Strategies:Modals y semi Modals que escuchan</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students are taught to make correct use of modals and semimodals, which they may also encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes some translation to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">modals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische 
Kursteilnehmer unterrichtet werden, korrekten Gebrauch von den modals 
und von den semimodals zu bilden, die sie in hörenden 
Erfassenübungen auch antreffen können. Schließt irgendeine 
Übersetzung zum Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où des étudiants anglais sont 
enseignés à faire l'utilisation correcte des modals et des 
semimodals, qu'ils peuvent également rencontrer dans des exercices 
d'écoute de compréhension. Inclut une certaine traduction à 
l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses 
sejam ensinados fazer o uso correto dos modals e dos semimodals, que 
podem também encontrar em exercícios escutando da compreensão. 
Inclui alguma tradução ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi 
inglesi sono insegnati fare l'uso corretto dei modals e dei 
semimodals, che possono anche incontrare nelle esercitazioni 
ascoltanti di comprensione. Include una certa traduzione ad 
ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές διδάσκονται για να κάνουν τη σωστή χρήση των modals
και των semimodals, την οποία μπορούν επίσης να αντιμετωπίσουν 
στις ασκήσεις κατανόησης ακούσματος. Περιλαμβάνει κάποια 
μετάφραση στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde enseñan los 
estudiantes ingleses a hacer el uso correcto de los modals y de los 
semimodals, que pueden también encontrar en ejercicios de la 
comprensión que escuchan. Incluye una cierta traducción al 
hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">modals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">modals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">modals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">modals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">modals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">modals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
